mapper.select: SELECT UP.VER_INFO , UP.SEND_DATE , UP.REMARK , UP.RSV_ID , DL.DL_CD_NM AS PROCE_RST FROM BM_UPD_LOG UP LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON UP.MNG_ID = D.MNG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'FTP_RESULT' ) AS DL ON UP.PROCE_RST = DL.DL_CD WHERE D.DVC_ID = #{value}

SELECT UP.VER_INFO , UP.SEND_DATE , UP.REMARK , UP.DVC_ID FROM BM_UPD_LOG UP LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON UP.DVC_ID = D.DVC_ID WHERE UP.DVC_ID = #{gridDvcId} AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(UP.SEND_DATE,"-",2) <= #{filter}
